summary: In post war Italy during the fifties it is very difficult to find a house to rent and a family ends up living in a former brothel.
cast: Peppino De Filippo|Laura Adani|Cristina Gaioni|Cathia Caro|Marcello Paolini|Mario Valdemarin|Achille Majeroni|George Ardisson|Luigi De Filippo|Franco Balducci|Antoine Nicos|Lola Braccini|Enrico Olivieri|Federico Collino|Arrigo Peri|Giusi Raspani Dandolo|Leopoldo Valentini|Angelo Zanolli|Franca Valeri|Vittorio Caprioli|Tot√≤|Nello Appodia|Adriana Asti|Vera Drudi|Giuliano Gemma|Guido Martufi|Mario Meniconi|Romano Milani|Ada Passari|Mimmo Poli|Giuseppe Rinaldi|Leonardo Severini|Filippo Spoletini
title: Arrangiatevi
